purpose: Provide a managed control plane (MCP) server for orchestrating AI workflows and resources in Azure AI Foundry
principle: Utilizes Azure cloud services to manage and deploy AI workloads with an emphasis on integration and scalability
reusability: Designed to be integrated with Azure services, provides APIs for managing AI workflows and resources
limitations: Limited to Azure ecosystem, still in early development stages, documentation may be incomplete
name: mcp-foundry
description: A MCP Server for Azure AI Foundry
